G

game - package game
 
game.actions - package game.actions
 
game.behaviours - package game.behaviours
 
getAction(Actor, GameMap) - Method in interface game.Behaviour
A factory for creating actions.
getAction(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.behaviours.AttackBehaviour
Returns a ZombieAttackAction if the actor is a Zombie that attacks an adjacent attackable Actor Returns an AttackAction that attacks an adjacent attackable Actor.
getAction(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.behaviours.EatBehaviour
Returns an EatAction that allows an damaged Actor who is standing on a Food to eat.
getAction(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.behaviours.FertilizeBehaviour
Returns a FertilizeAction that allows an Actor who is standing on an unripe Crop to fertilize it.
getAction(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.behaviours.FollowBehaviour
 
getAction(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.behaviours.HarvestBehaviour
Returns a HarvestAction that allows an Actor who is standing on or next to a ripe Crop to harvest it.
getAction(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.behaviours.HuntBehaviour
 
getAction(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.behaviours.PickUpWeaponBehaviour
Returns a PickUpItemAction if there is an WeaponItem on the location it's standing
getAction(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.behaviours.SowBehaviour
Returns a SowAction that allows an Actor whose adjacent Ground is a Dirt to have 33% probability of sowing a crop on it.
getAction(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.behaviours.WanderBehaviour
Returns a MoveAction to wander to a random location, if possible.
getAllowableActions(Actor, String, GameMap) - Method in class game.ZombieActor
 
getIntrinsicWeapon() - Method in class game.Zombie
Gets 1 of the possible type of intrinsic weapon which are punch or bite.
GroundCapability - Enum in game
An enum representing a collection of constants which indicate the capabilities of a Ground.
